text: Balazhi () is a rural locality (a village) in Kaltovsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 215 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 38 km from Iglino, 17 km from Kaltovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Balazhi
